articles.description: Luton's Premier League match at Bournemouth is stopped after their captain Tom Lockyer collapses on the pitch.
articles.title: Luton captain Lockyer collapses on pitch

articles.description: Phil Salt's stunning century helps England pull off their third-highest T20 international chase as they beat West Indies by seven wickets in the third T20.
articles.title: Salt century helps England chase 223 to beat WI

articles.description: Manchester City's stuttering title defence suffers another blow as Michael Olise's 95th-minute penalty rescues a dramatic point for Crystal Palace.
articles.title: Palace deny Man City win with 95th-minute penalty

articles.description: Barcelona's winless run stretches to three games as they are held to a draw by Valencia in La Liga.
articles.title: Stuttering Barcelona held to a draw by Valencia

articles.description: England captain Heather Knight reflects on the "extreme conditions" presented during her side's 347-run Test defeat by India.
articles.title: England undone by 'super extreme' conditions - Knight

articles.description: Martha Thomas' goal gives Tottenham a first Women's Super League victory over north London rivals Arsenal, who squander the chance to move top of the table.
articles.title: Spurs stun Arsenal to claim historic WSL derby win

articles.description: Liverpool and Scotland legend Sir Kenny Dalglish is to be honoured with the Lifetime Achievement award at BBC Sports Personality of the Year.
articles.title: Dalglish wins BBC Lifetime Achievement award

articles.description: Rampant Ulster storm to an impressive bonus-point win over Racing on a raucous Champions Cup night in Belfast.
articles.title: Ulster grab bonus-point win over Racing

articles.description: Devin Vassell scores a career-high 36 points as the San Antonio Spurs beat the Los Angeles Lakers to end their 18-game losing run.
articles.title: NBA: Devin Vassell helps San Antonio Spurs end losing run against Los Angeles Lakers

articles.description: Final Score's Fara Williams and Dion Dublin discuss whether Manchester City are feeling the mental fatigue of their Treble-winning season after the 2-2 draw with Crystal Palace.
articles.title: Are Man City mentally fatigued after Treble?
